Its non-slip surface ensures stability during even the most challenging poses, while the minimalist aesthetic connects you to a grounded, peaceful state of mind.

Having plant issues? This tree oil may be the solution. Neem Oil is a natural way to prevent and treat fungus issues, bacteria, and insects.

entry.title: Rosy Indoor Potting Soil
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grounded
Type: Accessories
Price: 17.00

Get right to the roots of plant health and growth with high-quality soil full of natural materials beloved by your houseplants. Healthy and weak greenery alike benefits from this robust soil mix. Plus, it’s sourced + manufactured thoughtfully, with the planet in mind.

entry.title: Matte Black Mister
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grounded Plants
Type: Accessories
Price: 32.00

FUNCTION

Elegantly compact, this mister makes the perfect plant, shelf, and tabletop accessory. Each pump delivers a generous mist, boosting humidity and keeping your plants healthy + happy.  

WHAT’S INCLUDED
  • Includes one 5.75” H x 3.5” W
  • Matte Black (brass) mister
  • Holds 10 oz of water

HOW TO USE
  1. Fill Matte Black Mister with non-tap water
  2. Generously mist leaves at least 3-4x per week
  3. Refill as needed.
  4. Wash occasionally with warm water and soap. 

RECOMMENDED FOR

Most indoor homes are too dry for our tropical plants, especially when we utilize A/C and heat sources. Misting the leaves is a great way to accommodate their humidity needs. Mist all your tropical plants, including:

  • Pothos
  • Marantas
  • Calatheas
  • Neanthe Palm
  • Philodendrons

Cacti and succulents should be kept away from sources of humidity.

entry.title: 8-in ZZ Plant
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grounded Plants
Type: Houseplants
Price: 75.00

SUN

The ZZ Plant is happy with any level of indirect light, even flourishing under artificial or low lighting. Proximity to afternoon sun is not recommended.  

WATER

This succulent is drought tolerant and will require that the soil fully dries in between waterings. ZZ’s have a root system that stores water, making them hardy and forgiving under some neglect. Reduce frequency during fall and winter.

AIR 

Their native environment is warm and dry, so average indoor air tends to work well for the ZZ Plant. Keep them in temperatures between 65-85º and away from sources of humidity. 

PET FRIENDLY

Keep out of reach from curious pets as these are toxic when ingested.

AESTHETIC

The ZZ Plant grows upright, graceful, wand-like stems that start thick and bulbous at the base, then tapers to a point. They produce shiny, dark green oval-shaped leaves along the stem. They can grow about 4 feet tall and under ideal conditions, will grow in width by many more stems. Native to dry areas of Africa, their unique root system stores water, which is why the plant can survive infrequent watering.

HEALTH BENEFITS

Active exposure to and care for plants has many proven wellbeing benefits, such as: 


  • Lower stress levels
  • Improved mood
  • Superior mental clarity and focus

ZZ Plants are also tremendous air purifiers, capable of removing significant amounts of xylene, toluene, benzene, and ethylbenzene from the air. Keep their leaves free of dust for optimal photosynthesis, oxygen production, and natural shine. 

SPIRITUAL INTERPRETATIONS

An ancient symbol of growth, protection, and good fortune, these are praised for their protective and prosperous energy in feng shui practices. Consider placing them in the east or southeast corner of your home, out of direct sunlight. 

DIFFICULTY LEVEL

Easy • Intermediate • Experienced 

WHAT’S INCLUDED

Arriving to you in careful packaging:

  • Live ZZ Plant 
  • Temporary 8-inch nursery pot
  • Care card with tips for success
  • Grounded Office Hours: Complimentary 1-on-1 support from our Plant Specialist

OUR RECS

We recommend clay or terra cotta planters with a drainage hole to provide ideal moisture control and airflow for the ZZ Plant. 


Ideal soil is a cacti/succulent mix with drainage-enhancing amendments such as sand or perlite.

Nature is unique - each plant may vary slightly from the plant shown here. Ceramic planters are sold separately.

entry.title: New Beginnings Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grounded Plants
Type: Houseplants
Price: 70.00

CARE INFO

WHAT’S INCLUDED

Arriving to you in careful packaging:


  • One 6-inch Lemon Lime Maranta Plant
  • One 7-inch Black Planter with Drainage Pan
  • One 7oz. Self-Watering Crystal
  • Grounded Office Hours: Complimentary 1-on-1 support from our Plant Specialist

HOW TO USE 

Self-Watering Crystal:

  1. Fill with non-tap, room temperature water.
  2. Cork-bottom down, angle the crystal 1-2 inches into the soil.
  3. Repeat + wipe clean as needed.

Note: Depending on the airflow, temperature, season, and light levels in your home, your Maranta will need the crystal refilled about every 7 days. We recommend always checking the soil moisture levels with your finger before watering. 

CARE NEEDS

SUN: Marantas prefers medium and indirect light. Placement at the interior of bright rooms or near north and east-facing windows are ideal. They’re adaptable to lower light levels, however improper lighting will change the leaf appearance.


WATER: Keep soil consistently moist but not wet. Water when the topsoil has dried 1-2 inches and use room temperature, non-tap water. Reduce frequency during fall and winter.


AIR: Mimic a tropical environment with temperatures between 65º-85º and a high moisture content. Most indoor air will require extra humidity in order for the Red Maranta to thrive. Provide a regular boost of humidity by:


  • Adding a humidifier nearby
  • Creating a pebble tray that lives underneath the pot
  • Placement in a bathroom or kitchen, if lighting is suitable
  • Misting the leaves 3-4x per week with non-tap water

SPIRITUAL INTERPRETATIONS

Known as a symbolism of gratitude, its daily act of “prayer” encourages us to set aside time for reflection in our own routines, as well as encourage us to connect with others and be present during life's moments.


Marantas make thoughtful gifts to remind our loved ones how impactful they are in our lives.
 

Nature is unique - each plant may vary slightly from the plant shown here. Ceramic planters are sold separately.

entry.title: Self-Watering Crystal

Vendor: Grounded Plants
Type: Accessories
Price: 18.00 - 48.00 (2 variants)

This sleek, glass crystal takes the worry of under-watering off your hands. With a cork bottom, it intelligently trickles water into the soil over the course of 3-4 days. Say hello, new growth!

entry.title: Rubber Tree
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grounded Plants
Type: Houseplants
Price: 28.00 - 58.00 (3 variants)

Care Info


SUN

The Rubber Tree is adaptable and will do best in medium to bright, indirect light. We recommend placing it in a room with east or south-facing windows that receive filtered light via curtains or blinds. 

WATER

Water generously when the top 50-75% of soil has dried, allowing all excess water to drain out. Use of non-tap water is recommended. Reduce frequency during Fall and Winter. 

AIR

Mimic their native tropical environment with temperatures between 65º-85º and a high humidity. A few easy tricks to boost humidity are:


  • Misting the leaves 3-4x per week with non-tap water
  • Adding a humidifier nearby
  • Creating a pebble tray that lives underneath the pot

Be sure to keep your Rubber Tree away from drafty rooms, windows, and vents. 

PET FRIENDLY

The Rubber Tree is not pet-friendly. The sap inside of the plant is toxic if ingested.

AESTHETIC

Native to jungles in southern Asia, the Rubber Tree is a gorgeous tree that grows long, oval, and pointed leaves that can change shape over the plant’s lifetime. New leaves grow in burgundy, eventually changing into a deep green. Indoors, this plant can live over 10 years and grow over 6 feet in its lifetime. 

HEALTH BENEFITS

Active exposure to and care for plants has many proven wellbeing benefits, such as: 


  • Lower stress levels
  • Improved mood
  • Superior mental clarity and focus

Rubber Trees are excellent at absorbing indoor toxins through their large leaves. In return, they produce oxygen which allows us to breathe and sleep better. Dust the leaves regularly for optimal photosynthesis and shine. 

SPIRITUAL INTERPRETATIONS

Rubber Trees are Ficus plants, known to represent peace and abundance in some cultures. Place your Rubber Tree intentionally in your home to serve as a reminder and attract full wellbeing in your life. 

DIFFICULTY LEVEL

Easy • Intermediate • Experienced 

WHAT’S INCLUDED

Arriving to you in careful packaging:


  • Live Rubber Tree
  • Temporary 4-inch nursery pot
  • Care card with tips for success 
  • Grounded Office Hours: Complimentary 1-on-1 support from our Plant Specialist

OUR RECS

We recommend ceramic planter with a drainage hole to provide ideal moisture balance and airflow for the Rubber Tree. When repotting, use a planter of the same size or no more than 2 inches larger. 


Ideal soil is a well-draining mix with aerating and moisture-retaining amendments such as bark, sand, and/or perlite.

 

Nature is unique - each plant may vary slightly from the plant shown here. Ceramic planters are sold separately.

entry.title: Philodendron Cordatum
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grounded Plants
Type: Houseplants
Price: 18.00 - 54.00 (6 variants)

Care Info

SUN
The Philodendron Cordatum prefers bright and indirect light, though they also thrive in medium to low light conditions. 
WATER
Keep soil slightly moist and water once the soil has dried about halfway. They are forgiving but appreciate consistent waterings. Reduce frequency during fall and winter.
AIR
Mimic a tropical environment with temperatures between 65º-85º and a high moisture content. Provide a regular boost of humidity by:
  • Adding a humidifier nearby
  • Creating a pebble tray that lives underneath the pot
  • Placement in a bathroom or kitchen, if lighting is suitable
  • Misting the leaves 2-4x per week with non-tap water
PET FRIENDLY
Keep out of reach from curious pets. These are toxic when ingested. 
AESTHETIC
The Philodendron Cordatum grows many trailing vines with heart-shaped, jade-colored leaves. Native to tropical climates in Brazil, these can trail or climb with support. Depending on the conditions, their leaves will grow petite or up to 3” large. 
Their versatility to trail, hang, and climb make them a beautiful accent for any room.
HEALTH BENEFITS
Active exposure to and care for plants has many proven wellbeing benefits, such as: 
  • Lower stress levels
  • Improved mood
  • Superior mental clarity and focus
Philodendrons are also tremendous air purifiers, capable of removing significant amounts of indoor toxins. Keep their leaves free of dust for optimal photosynthesis and oxygen production.
SPIRITUAL INTERPRETATIONS
Philodendrons symbolize health and abundance, offering a deeper and intentional connection to its care. According to Feng Shui practices, thoughtful placement in the center of your home can channel positive energy for health. Additionally, any other area of your home where you’d like to be mindful of abundant energy. 
DIFFICULTY LEVEL
Easy • Intermediate • Experienced 
WHAT’S INCLUDED
Arriving to you in careful packaging:

 

  • Live Philodendron Cordatum
  • Temporary 6-inch nursery pot
  • Care card with tips for success
  • Grounded Office Hours: Complimentary 1-on-1 support from our Plant Specialist
OUR RECS
We recommend a 7-inch ceramic planter with a drainage hole to provide ideal moisture balance for your Philodendron Cordatum. When repotting, keep your Cordatum in a planter of the same size or no more than 2 inches larger.  
Ideal soil is a well-draining mix with aerating and moisture-retaining amendments such as sand, bark, and/or perlite.

Nature is unique - each plant may vary slightly from the plant shown here. Ceramic planters are sold separately.

entry.title: 10-in Sansevieria Laurentii
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grounded Plants
Type: Houseplants
Price: 60.00

CARE INFO 


SUN
The Snake Plant is adaptable to a variety of light levels, including low lighting. They will grow fastest under bright, indirect light, and can even tolerate some direct light when they’re mature.  
WATER
This succulent is drought tolerant and will require that the soil fully dries in between waterings. Snake plants can benefit from careful bottom watering and thorough soak on occasion. Be sure to reduce watering during the fall and winter. 
AIR 
Their native environment is warm and dry, so average indoor air tends to work well for the Snake Plant. Keep them in temperatures between 60º-85º and away from sources of humidity. 
PET FRIENDLY
Keep out of reach from curious pets. These are toxic when ingested. 
AESTHETIC
Native to West Africa, Sansevieria Zeylanica grows sword-like leaves in clusters, reaching heights up to 4 feet. . An efficient root system stores water so it can survive infrequent watering. Their upright silhouettes make them a great option for small spaces, tabletops, and floor accents alike.
HEALTH BENEFITS
Active exposure to and care for plants has many proven wellbeing benefits, such as: 
  • Lower stress levels
  • Improved mood
  • Superior mental clarity and focus
Snake plants are excellent air purifiers, absorbing common air toxins and mold spores. They are one of few plants that continue to produce oxygen throughout the night and are a great addition to the bedroom for a better night’s sleep. 
SPIRITUAL INTERPRETATIONS
Snake plants represent luck, strength, and resilience. Their adaptability is a reflection of their natural will to survive, despite tough conditions. More than a symbol of luck, sharing space with a Snake Plant serves as a reminder of our own perseverance.
DIFFICULTY LEVEL
Easy • Intermediate • Experienced 
WHAT’S INCLUDED
Arriving to you in careful packaging:
  • Live Sansevieria Laurentii “Snake Plant” 
  • Temporary 6-inch nursery pot
  • Care card with tips for success
  • Grounded Office Hours: Complimentary 1-on-1 support from our Plant Specialist
OUR RECS
Ideal soil is a cacti/succulent mix with drainage-enhancing amendments such as sand, bark, and/or perlite. 

Nature is unique - each plant may vary slightly from the plant shown here. Ceramic planters are sold separately.

entry.title: Ponytail Palm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grounded Plants
Type: Houseplants
Price: 35.00 - 62.00 (3 variants)

Care Info

SUN
The Ponytail Palm requires bright and indirect light. Place it in your brightest room, near an east, west, or south-facing window and out of direct sun rays. 
WATER
The bulging trunk of this palm stores water, making it drought-tolerant. Allow the soil to fully dry in between waterings. On occasion, you can water them deeply, allowing all excess water to drain out. Be sure to reduce frequency during the fall and winter. 
AIR
Their native environment is warm and dry, so average indoor air tends to work well. Keep them in temperatures between 60º-85º and away from sources of humidity. 
PET FRIENDLY
Ponytail Palms are safe for cats and dogs.
AESTHETIC
Native to the dry regions of Mexico, this succulent gets its name from the long, curly leaves that hang from its swollen brown trunk. The trunk bulges when it stores water and shrivels when its resources are depleted. While it can slowly grow up to 6 feet indoors, its unique silhouette and petite size add worthy flair to any room.
HEALTH BENEFITS
Active exposure to and care for plants has many proven wellbeing benefits, such as: 
  • Lower stress levels
  • Improved mood
  • Superior mental clarity and focus
Ponytail Palms are fantastic air purifiers, absorbing common indoor toxins like benzene, and formaldehyde. Plus, they create oxygen to help us breathe and sleep better. 
SPIRITUAL INTERPRETATIONS
Ponytail Palms represent free and strong-willed spirits. Their perseverance and resourcefulness allow them to thrive as one of the most unique plants that exist. Their hardiness and resilience under negligence make them the perfect gift for a traveler.
DIFFICULTY LEVEL
Easy • Intermediate • Experienced 
WHAT’S INCLUDED
Arriving to you in careful packaging:
  • Live Ponytail Palm  
  • Temporary 4-inch or 6-inch nursery pot
  • Care card with tips for success
  • Grounded Office Hours: Complimentary 1-on-1 support from our Plant Specialist
OUR RECS
We recommend a clay or ceramic planter with a drainage hole to provide optimal drainage and airflow for the Ponytail Palm. 
Ideal soil is a cacti/succulent mix with drainage-enhancing amendments such as sand, bark, and/or perlite. 


    Nature is unique - each plant may vary slightly from the plant shown here. Ceramic planters are sold separately.

entry.title: Cactus Window Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grounded Plants
Type: Houseplants
Price: 32.00


Care Info

SUN

The Golden Barrel Cactus requires plenty of bright light. It should have access to many hours of full sun most days. Access to a South or West-facing window is best.

WATER

This cactus stores water inside its barrel, making it drought-tolerant and hardy to some periods of neglect. Water deeply after the soil has fully dried. This may be as infrequent as every 1-3 months. Reduce frequency during fall and winter.

AIR

Their native environment is warm and dry, so average indoor air tends to work well. Keep them in temperatures between 55º-80º and away from sources of humidity. 

PET FRIENDLY

Golden Barrel Cactus needles are not safe for pets or children.

AESTHETIC

Native to the desert lands of Mexico, the Golden Barrel cactus survives on very little water and plenty of full light. These cacti grow round, resembling a sphere with clusters of spiky golden needles growing along their ribs. In nature, these needles protect them from predators along with a toxic sap that can cause skin irritation in humans. Indoors, they can grow up to 2 feet tall and 10 inches wide.  

HEALTH BENEFITS

Active exposure to and care for plants has many proven wellbeing benefits, such as: 


  • Lower stress levels
  • Improved mood
  • Superior mental clarity and focus

Golden Barrel Cactus absorb carbon dioxie and release oxygen in return. This helps us breathe and sleep better. 

SPIRITUAL INTERPRETATIONS

Cacti represent strength, protection, and endurance. The conditions they’re able to thrive and grow under are impressive for any living organism. Keep them nearby as a reminder of your own perseverance and will.

DIFFICULTY LEVEL

Easy • Intermediate • Experienced 

WHAT’S INCLUDED

Arriving to you in careful packaging:


  • Live Golden Barrel Cactus  
  • Temporary 6-inch nursery pot
  • Care card with tips for success
  • Grounded Office Hours: Complimentary 1-on-1 support from our Plant Specialist

OUR RECS

We recommend clay or terra cotta planters with a drainage hole to provide ideal moisture control and airflow for the Golden Barrel. These can skip a few years in between repotting, and should be in a planter of the same size or no more than 2 inches larger.  


Ideal soil is a cacti/succulent mix with drainage-enhancing amendments such as sand or perlite.


Nature is unique - each plant may vary slightly from the plant shown here. Ceramic planters are sold separately.

entry.title: Maranta Duo
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grounded Plants
Type: Houseplants
Price: 75.00

CARE INFO

SUN

The Lemon Lime Maranta and Red Maranta prefer medium and indirect light. Placement at the interior of bright rooms and near north or east-facing windows is ideal. They’re adaptable to lower light levels, however improper lighting will change the leaf appearance.

WATER

Keep soil consistently moist but not wet. Water when the topsoil has dried 1-2 inches and use room temperature, non-tap water. Reduce frequency during fall and winter.

AIR

Mimic a tropical environment with temperatures between 65º-85º and high moisture content. Most indoor air will require extra humidity in order for the Marantas to thrive. Provide a regular boost of humidity by:

Adding a humidifier nearby

Creating a pebble tray that lives underneath the pot

Placement in a bathroom or kitchen, if lighting is suitable

Misting the leaves 2-4x per week with non-tap water

PET FRIENDLY

Marantas are safe for cats and dogs.

AESTHETIC

Marantas grow medium-sized oval leaves on spanning stems.

The Lemon Lime’s deep green leaf is contrasted by bright neon veins and bursts along the midrib, coining its yellow-green appearance. Red Marantas have deep green leaves contrasted by red veins and bursts of bright neon along the midrib. Their growth is spread low and wide, usually no more than 3 feet across indoors. 

 

These plants open and close their leaves in response to daylight and darkness, a fascinating process called nyctinasty. Their expansive stems folding up at night is why they are often called “prayer plants”. Native to tropical forests in Brazil, this allows the plant to protect itself and conserve moisture at night. 

HEALTH BENEFITS

Active exposure to and care for plants has many proven wellbeing benefits, such as: 

 

Lower stress levels

Improved mood

Superior mental clarity and focus

 

With their expansive leaves, Marantas are excellent air-purifiers. We recommend them as a plant to keep in the bedroom: their peaceful leaves, oxygenating properties, and humidifying capabilities will help you sleep better and feel refreshed in the morning. Keep their leaves free of dust for optimal photosynthesis and oxygen production.

SPIRITUAL INTERPRETATIONS

Known as a symbolism of gratitude, its daily act of “prayer” encourages us to set aside time for reflection in our own routines, as well as encourage us to connect with others and be present during life's moments.

Marantas make thoughtful gifts to remind our loved ones how impactful they are in our lives.

DIFFICULTY LEVEL

Easy • Intermediate • Experienced 

WHAT’S INCLUDED

Arriving to you in careful packaging:

 

Live Lemon Lime Maranta and Red Marantas

(2) Matte Black  5-inch Matte Black Planters

Care card with tips for success

Grounded Office Hours: Complimentary 1-on-1 support from our Plant Specialist

OUR RECS

When repotting, keep your Maranta in a planter of the same size or no more than 2 inches larger.  

 

Ideal soil amendments include combining coco coir, sand, and/or perlite with your standard potting mix.

entry.title: 10-in Monstera Deliciosa
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grounded Plants
Type: Houseplants
Price: 80.00

SUN

The Monstera Deliciosa prefers medium to bright, indirect light. Sunlight filtered through blinds or curtains at East and South-facing windows is ideal. Keep out of direct light and rotate regularly for even growth.

WATER

Water generously once the top 50%-75% of soil has dried, allowing a brief period of drought in between. Water should drain out each time before being discarded. Reduce frequency during fall and winter. Non-tap water is recommended.

AIR

Mimic a tropical environment with temperatures between 65º-80º and a high moisture content. Provide a regular boost of humidity by:


  • Misting the leaves 3-4x per week with non-tap water
  • Adding a humidifier nearby
  • Creating a pebble tray that lives underneath the pot
  • Placement in a bathroom or kitchen, if lighting is suitable  

PET FRIENDLY

Keep out of reach from curious pets. These are toxic when ingested

AESTHETIC

Monsteras are a distinct plant originating from Southern Mexico, Panama, and surrounding tropical areas. The Monstera Deliciosa grows large leaves that develop holes (known as fenestrations) as it matures. Under their native habitat of the rainforest canopy, these holes allow sunlight to reach lower leaves. They’re able to climb vertically using aerial roots. Indoors, these require a support system, such as a coco coir pole, to properly climb and can ascend 15 feet in height.

HEALTH BENEFITS

Active exposure to and care for plants has many proven wellbeing benefits, such as: 


  • Lower stress levels
  • Improved mood
  • Superior mental clarity and focus

Monsteras benefit our physical health by absorbing toxins commonly found indoors, like benzene, formaldehyde, and toluene. Their humidifying capabilities will also help you sleep and breathe better. Keep their leaves free of dust for optimal photosynthesis, oxygen, and shine.

SPIRITUAL INTERPRETATIONS

Monsteras symbolize honor, and respect for long life, manifested by their own longevity. Place them in your home as a reminder to live a healthy, joyous life or gift them to a beloved family member to show them your love + appreciation. 

DIFFICULTY LEVEL

Easy • Intermediate • Experienced 

WHAT’S INCLUDED

Arriving to you in careful packaging:


  • Live Monstera Deliciosa plant
  • Temporary 10-inch nursery pot
  • Care card with tips for success
  • Grounded Office Hours: Complimentary 1-on-1 support from our Plant Specialist

OUR RECS

We recommend a ceramic planter with plenty of drainage to provide ideal moisture balance for your Monstera. When repotting, keep it in a planter of the same size or no more than 2 inches larger.  


A well-draining soil with amendments such as coco coir and/or perlite will provide a healthy balance of moisture retention, aeration, and drainage.   
 

 

Nature is unique - each plant may vary slightly from the plant shown here. Ceramic planters are sold separately.

entry.title: 10-in Birds Of Paradise
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grounded Plants
Type: Houseplants
Price: 75.00

Care Info

SUN

The Birds of Paradise enjoy bright sunlight. Place your indoor Bird of Paradise in a spot where it will get the most light.

WATER

Keep the soil moist in spring and summer, during the growing season, but allow the soil to dry between waterings in the dormant fall and winter months.

AIR

Mimic a tropical environment with temperatures between 65º-85º and a high moisture content. You can provide a regular boost of humidity by:


  • Adding a humidifier nearby
  • Creating a pebble tray that lives underneath the pot
  • Misting the leaves 4-7x per week with non-tap water

PET FRIENDLY

Keep out of reach from curious pets. These are toxic when ingested. 

AESTHETIC

Strelitzia is a genus of five species of perennial plants, native to South Africa. It belongs to the plant family Strelitziaceae. Can grow up to 30 feet tall in the wild

HEALTH BENEFITS

Active exposure to and care for plants has many proven wellbeing benefits, such as: 


  • Lower stress levels
  • Improved mood
  • Superior mental clarity and focus

The Anthurium is one of the greenest air purifiers, producing oxygen while absorbing the most common indoor toxins through its leaves. Dust the leaves regularly for optimal photosynthesis and shine. 

SPIRITUAL INTERPRETATIONS

The Bird of Paradise is known as the ultimate symbol of paradise and freedom. Due to its tropical nature, this flower also symbolizes freedom and joy.

DIFFICULTY LEVEL

Easy • Intermediate • Experienced 

WHAT’S INCLUDED

Arriving to you in careful packaging:


  • Live Birds Of Paradise
  • Temporary 10-inch nursery pot
  • Care card with tips for success 

OUR RECS

We recommend a sturdy clay or ceramic planter with a drainage hole to provide ideal moisture retention for the Birds Of Paradise. When repotting, use a planter of the same size or no more than 2 inches larger.  


Ideal soil is a well-draining mix with aerating and moisture-retaining amendments such as perlite, bark, and/or sand. 

Allow 3-5 business days for processing and 7-10 business days for shipping.

entry.title: 10-in Fiddle Leaf Fig Tree
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grounded Plants
Type: Houseplants
Price: 85.00

Care Info 

SUN

The Fiddle Leaf Fig requires bright, filtered light to grow and look its best. South and east-facing windows will offer many hours of bright and indirect sunlight. Sheer curtains will also offer ideal filtration.

WATER

Maintain a consistent watering schedule, repeating once the top 50%-75% of soil has dried. It is essential that water is delivered slowly and fully around the pot until all excess has flown out of the drainage hole. Use of non-tap water is recommended.

AIR

Mimic a tropical environment with temperatures between 65º-85º and a high moisture content. You can provide a regular boost of humidity by:


  • Adding a humidifier nearby
  • Creating a pebble tray that lives underneath the pot
  • Misting the leaves 2-4x per week with non-tap water

PET FRIENDLY

Keep out of reach from curious pets. These are toxic when ingested. 

AESTHETIC

The Fiddle Leaf Fig is native to the tropical rainforests of West Africa and is known for its distinctive leaves, which are shaped like the namesake instrument. Leaves grow on a main trunk that can reach up to 10 feet tall indoors. Branches grow semi-sparsely, extending up to 3 feet from any side. The large leaves are strong with a shine over their emerald green color. A Fiddle’s unique silhouette and stand-out color make them a popular statement piece indoors. 

HEALTH BENEFITS

Active exposure to and care for plants has many proven wellbeing benefits, such as: 


  • Lower stress levels
  • Improved mood
  • Superior mental clarity and focus

The Fiddle Leaf is one of the greenest air purifiers, producing oxygen while absorbing the most common indoor toxins through its large leaves and soil. Dust the leaves regularly for optimal photosynthesis and shine. 

SPIRITUAL INTERPRETATIONS

The Fiddle Leaf Fig symbolizes fertility, abundance, and good luck.  The care they require is a testament to our own skills and ability to nurture life + growth. Following Feng Shui practices, placement at a central-eastern window can attract abundant health in the home, and a south-eastern corner can attract prosperity.  

DIFFICULTY LEVEL

Easy • Intermediate • Experienced 

WHAT’S INCLUDED

Arriving to you in careful packaging:


  • Live Fiddle Leaf Fig
  • Temporary 10-inch nursery pot
  • Care card with tips for success 

OUR RECS

We recommend a sturdy clay or ceramic planter with a drainage hole to provide ideal moisture retention for the Fiddle. When repotting, use a planter of the same size or no more than 2 inches larger.  


Ideal soil is a well-draining mix with aerating and moisture-retaining amendments such as peat moss, perlite, bark, and/or sand.

entry.title: Mosquito Bits
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grounded
Type: Accessories
Price: 15.00

DESCRIPTION

Female fungus gnats lay hundreds of eggs that become flying adults within just two weeks. Get ahead of the infestation using the bacteria found in Mosquito Bits, naturally fatal to the larvae of fungus gnats and mosquitoes.

 

Bits are safe for use on indoor plants and in the garden. These natural bacteria do not cause harm to beneficial insects such as bees and ladybugs. This product is also safe for use around pets, people, and animals.

 

Active Ingredient: Bacillus thuringiensis subspecies israelensis (BTI), a naturally occurring bacterium.

BENEFITS

Mosquito Bits eliminate fungus gnat eggs and larvae inside soil, effectively targeting fungus gnat infestations caused by overwatering, poor drainage, root rot, and spread from other plants. 

 

Learn more about the causes and signs of fungus gnats here.

WHAT’S INCLUDED
  • One 8 oz Mosquito Bits package

HOW TO USE

Easily treat your plants with mosquito bits using one of the below methods:

 

DIRECT SOIL METHOD:

  1. Shake mosquito bits directly onto the soil’s surface
  2. Gently work some of the bits into the top inches of soil
  3. Follow with water and resume its usual care schedule

 

*Repeat for the next 2-3 waterings, or weekly, on your affected plants. Continue use if needed.

 

 

BITS “TEA” WATER

  1. Create a tea mixture using two tablespoons of bits per half gallon of water (double these measurements for large treatments) 
  2. Let the bits soak in the water for 30-60 minutes
  3. Pour directly onto the soil of your affected plants  
  • Pour the bits with the water, scoop them out before pouring, or create a tea bag by repurposing a cut stocking or old t-shirt

 

*Repeat for the next 2-3 waterings, or weekly, on your affected plants. Continue use if needed.

*Use tea mixture right away.

entry.title: Money Tree
entry.summary:
Vendor: Grounded Plants
Type: Houseplants
Price: 25.00 - 42.00 (3 variants)

Care Info

SUN

Money Trees prefer medium to bright, indirect light. They’re also adaptable to low and fluorescent lighting but will experience slower growth.

WATER

Water well once the top 50%-75% of soil has dried, allowing all excess to flow from the drainage hole. Reduce frequency through fall and winter. Use of non-tap water is recommended.

AIR

Mimic a tropical environment with temperatures between 65º-85º and a high moisture content. You can provide a regular boost of humidity by:


  • Adding a humidifier nearby
  • Creating a pebble tray that lives underneath the pot
  • Misting the leaves 2-4x per week with non-tap water

PET FRIENDLY

Keep out of reach from curious pets. These are toxic when ingested. 

AESTHETIC

Money Trees are native to tropical regions of western Asia and southeast Europe. They typically have multiple trunks braided together when they’re very young and continue to grow this way. Each trunk grows fanning leaves in clusters of five or more, creating a canopy effect over the thick green and brown trunk below. Over their life span of 10+ years, they can grow up to 6 feet, provided supreme indoor conditions. 

HEALTH BENEFITS

Active exposure to and care for plants has many proven wellbeing benefits, such as: 


  • Lower stress levels
  • Improved mood
  • Superior mental clarity and focus

The Money Tree removes many toxic chemicals from our air, including ​​trichloroethylene, benzene, and carbon dioxide. We’re able to breathe and sleep better air thanks to the oxygen it gives us. Dust the leaves regularly for optimal photosynthesis and shine. 

SPIRITUAL INTERPRETATIONS

Just as their name suggests, the Money Tree has long symbolized prosperity, wealth, and good luck. Consider placing it in the southeast or far left corner of your home to attract wealth, following ancient Feng Shui practices. It is said that a trunk growing a 7-leaf cluster is incredibly lucky. Money Trees are considered a Bonsai Tree, believed to attract joyful and positive energy in your space. 

DIFFICULTY LEVEL

Easy • Intermediate • Experienced 

WHAT’S INCLUDED

Arriving to you in careful packaging:

  • Live Money Tree
  • Temporary 4-inch nursery pot
  • Care card with tips for success 
  • Grounded Office Hours: Complimentary 1-on-1 support from our Plant Specialist

OUR RECS

We recommend a sturdy clay or ceramic planter with a drainage hole to provide ideal moisture balance and airflow for the Money Tree. When repotting, use a planter of the same size or no more than 2 inches larger.  


Ideal soil is a well-draining mix with aerating and moisture-retaining amendments such as perlite, coco coir, and/or sand. 


Nature is unique - each plant may vary slightly from the plant shown here. Ceramic planters are sold separately.
